fullText: Despite a few memorable songs and some dazzling production values, American Psycho never finds a way to make its central character compelling or its story emotionally engaging.
dtliExcerpt: Despite a few memorable songs and some dazzling production values, American Psycho never finds a way to make its central character compelling or its story emotionally engaging.
